It looks like they are leaving the Clifton Hotel in Niagara Falls from the previous image.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: R. S. Naon, was the Argentinian minister acting as one of the A B C mediators at the Niagara Falls peace conference. See NYT of May 28, 1914. query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F60814F93C5E13738... The A B C mediators/envoys were from Argentina: R.S. Naon Brazil: D Da Gama Chile: E. Suarez Mujica from NYT of May 13, 1914 in an article reporting the offer of a mediation conference. query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F7091EFA3C5E13738...

comment.author: 82878259@N00
comment._content: What a wonderful rare old picture of The Beatles

comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: I started an article on the conference in Wikipedia: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ABC_Conference The ABC Conference started on May 20, 1914, when the the ABC Powers met in Niagara Falls, Canada, to mediate diplomatically in order to avoid war between the United States and Mexico after increasing tensions over the Tampico Affair and the United States occupation of Veracruz, and the issues that led to the Mexican Revolution. At the conference, the United States was represented by Frederick William Lehmann, a former United States Solicitor General, and Joseph Rucker Lamar, an Associate Justice of the Supreme Court of the United States. I also started a biography of Romulo S. Naon: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Romulo_S._Naon
